name: Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed scripts using a command-line interpreter, leading to the installation of a backdoor.

action--de33c50b-e8fd-4beb-9d9b-5a05ee03.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--de33c50b-e8fd-4beb-9d9b-5a05ee03.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

action--914ab2f4-39a7-41a4-b94f-8460850d.name: Remove dropped backdoor script
action--914ab2f4-39a7-41a4-b94f-8460850d.description: Remove the malicious backdoor script that was dropped on the system.

while-condition--ad76c8e4-b2b8-459c-9ac3.name: Perform a full system scan loop
while-condition--ad76c8e4-b2b8-459c-9ac3.description: Continuously perform a full system scan until the scan is clean.

action--5652136b-803d-43c8-802a-92a5f192.name: Run a full system scan
action--5652136b-803d-43c8-802a-92a5f192.description: Execute the full system scan to detect any remaining threats.
